item.title: Mar 7_10_05_11
item.description: Query: Give me a random quote about writing Mar 7_10_05_11 [!tldr] Mar 7_10_05_11 TLDR Text is too short to sumarize Here’s a random quote about writing, taken from the book “Writing down the bones: a practical guide to fiction writing” by francine prose: “Innovation is not just for artists. It’s for everyone.” Susan cain, author of Quiet: the power of introverts in a world that can’t stop talking. Author: tinyllama

item.title: Mar 7
item.description: Query: Get a random quote about writing Mar 7 [!tldr] Mar 7 TLDR Text is too short to sumarize “Writing is one of the most beautiful and transformative crafts we all know. It’s like a painter who paints with words, to create a canvas that speaks on its own. As I sit here, lost in my thoughts, writing this, i feel a sense of euphoria that i haven’t felt in some time.
